title: EYL #136 Mike Rashid on building a fitness empire
itunes:title: EYL #136 Mike Rashid on building a fitness empire
description:
Mike Rashid has established himself as a leading authority in the health and wellness field. He’s transitioned from being a boxer in his youth and personal trainer years ago to today owning a fitness empire. He runs one of the most successful supplement brands in the world The Ambrosia Collective which grosses millions of dollars a month in revenue, and he has a 20,000 square foot warehouse in California to ship the supply nationwide.


He recently launched a guilt-free healthy snack line, he runs a wildly popular meal prep business, and he’s an internet superstar with over 1 million subscribers on YouTube. 


On EYL 136, we talked about his journey in building his empire from the ground up, he detailed health tips, he also outlined a blueprint for personal trainers to build a brand, social media advice, and we outlined the EYL x Mike Rashid 30 Day Fitness challenge. #fitness #mikerashid #training 


Link to EYL x Mike Rashid Fitness Challenge: http://alphaeyl.Com


EYL University: https://www.eyluniversity.com

EYL University 60% Off Sale Annual Tuition 


Host IG: https://instagram.com/earnyourleisure?igshid=19xmzxzu82xmx


Guest IG: https://instagram.com/mikerashid?utm_medium=copy_link
